name: cromulent
text: Billy's just working with what he's got.

name: centipede_damascus
text: I wish I had a sex bicycle.

name: jdhenry105
text: A comment left by jdhenry105 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by JuanCarlos, the_dingle, Carrot)

name: jaldor
text: Ow

name: apocowarg
text: I'd rather have an illegal ghost bike. I'm sure that says something about me but i don't know what.

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: A comment left by everything_is_a_hat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by apocowarg, farqussus, aquamuffin, ConnorMc)

name: rasalghul
text: Psh.  That's just a bicycle with training wheels on the front and back.  Maybe good for cycling home from the pub.

name: riotnrrd
text: I wish some person from scarygoround.com would bother me about things.

name: professoryes
text: Sex bicycle. I thought they called those tandem bicycles, but that was a bit of childhood argot I picked up on the playground at primary school.

name: hpk
text: A chubby for argot.

name: iandorrinson
text: i tried to convince my band that we should be called Sex Bicycle, but they weren't having it

name: mastronaut
text: oh damn that would have been so rad

name: cyberia
text: I would totally listen to a band called Sex Bicycle

name: tekende
text: Who wouldn't??

name: zapatos
text: I wouldn't, but it would probably be blaring from someone's speakers in the high school parking lot.  Then I'd hear it.  Damn you got me.

name: undyingsong
text: How apparently lame!

name: deliciousmuffin
text: I suppose Sexual Homeboys is also out of the question then, huh?

name: aelindil
text: Or Sex Funeral.

name: iandorrinson
text: yeah, I don't think Sexual Homeboys would fly. I also threw out The Doctor Jays of Killing People. Sort of sends the wrong message..

name: anzio
text: Sex Funeral would have been better.

name: hateandwar
text: I had an old Cutlass I called The Sex Buick. The Transmission died and I ended up junking it but it was pretty nice while it lasted.

name: farqussus
text:
I had an old cutlass which I wavved around while saying "Yarrr."


I did not do any of those things.

name: snowman
text: Philippe's little paws over his mouth.

name: redmange
text: This is a great -Birthday strip- for me.  I will forever refer to my bicycles with the prefix sex-.

name: dusty
text: sex chair, sex hat, sex lunch, sex vagina

name: wonelove
text:
sex vagina kind of seems redundant.
I mean...what else would it be for?

name: mr_lostman28
text: Birth vagina.

name: tekende
text: P--peeing?

name: gethen
text: tekende, i want this to be a joke, but I don't get it?

name: dusty
text: he's stating a use of a vagina besides sex. If you didn't know they use them for that too I hope you aren't too horrified by this discovery. I'm afraid I have to inform you women's anuses have another use besides sex as well.

name: gethen
text: but, but, women don't pee out of the vagina! We pee out the urethra, same as anyone, and that's not in the vagina.

name: gethen
text:
Here is a diagram:

http://www.afraidtoask.com/woman/vulva.html

name: dusty
text: you're right, I remember hearing this before, I generally think of vagina as meaning the labia and everything between them, but technically its only the opening inside. Though this does make me wonder again why women are supposed to pee after sex.

name: tekende
text: That's how I was thinking of it too. Why them ladies got to be so complicated up ins?

name: dusty
text: Well a receiving dock does have a lot more equipment than a delivery truck.

name: jlynes
text: Best. Analogy. Ever.

name: greenkoolayd
text: indeed.  thats why i saved this page on my desktop.  so i can go back and read this comment stream any time i want to laugh until i choke.

name: atypicaloracle
text: Somehow my brain took what you said - the magnificent thing you said - and went receiving dock -> delivery truck -> series of tubes -> reproductive organs -> the internet. I am sitting here creating the Katamari of reproductive analogies. I am moved to tears by the size of the thing.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: kata wha?

name: hpk
text:
Na Naaaaaaaaaa!
Na
Na Na Na
Na Na
Na

KATAMARI DAMA-SHIIII!!!

name: hpk
text:
Aw dang, and I had it all formatted like musical notes, too.

Another plot foiled by rational comment programming decisions.

name: boredom_man
text: Shit, dude.

name: dusty
text: if you're a gynecologist than what your dealing with are work vaginae. as i see it "work" is the opposite of "sex", as a prefix anyway. For example "thats just my work bicycle" see how that has the opposite effect?

name: libelandslander
text: I have a tricycle. I believe it has a name now.

name: zapatos
text: I also have a pretty neat bicycle.  I love to ride it, I ride it around town.  People in their cars look at me, but I just keep pedalling.  It is about my favorite pass-time, to ride my bike, in the town, along the roads.

name: greenkoolayd
text: agreed.  its funny(not haha) that i like to ride bike so much, but i hate to run.  even if my life was in danger, id have to think about whether i really wanted to exert myself that much.  im sure thats a part of why im fat.

name: mikeronomicon
text: My bike is totally a sex bicycle. It is the sexiest bike ever.

name: ariamaki
text:
And now this wonderful strip has FINALLY made it to shirt-dom.
I love the open-top hair here.
